channel.title: Comments on: Rockspan – A sustainable farm in Missouri

item.title: By: DougNic
item.dc:creator: DougNic
item.description: glad you liked it...i would love to post more stuff you find interesting...you have good taste...
item.content:encoded: glad you liked it…i would love to post more stuff you find interesting…you have good taste…

item.title: By: CarolKn
item.dc:creator: CarolKn
item.description:
Thanks, Doug! I'm happy to help, especially when it comes to sustainability and the environment.
It's a very interesting article shared on Facebook by Kent Childs. I agree with Kent, who wrote, "People like Dan and Margy make me very hopeful about our future."
item.content:encoded:
Thanks, Doug! I’m happy to help, especially when it comes to sustainability and the environment.

It’s a very interesting article shared on Facebook by Kent Childs. I agree with Kent, who wrote, “People like Dan and Margy make me very hopeful about our future.”
